page.title: 03Children's Clubs
page.content:
Here are some contributions from children about clubs they belong to.
1. Travis Board; 7 years and 10 months
I go to a BMX club on Saturdays and Sundays.I have a mini Burner bike that can go fast over bumps. We have a track that is about 400 metres long and has about 10 bumps.One bump is large and is called a table top.On Sundays we have races with other groups.I won a silver necklace when I came first in a race.
2 Gavin Pearce; 7 years and 10 months
I belong to the RSPB club.We go to the country and we go to woods and we go out in boats to look for birds. I usually go with my dad.
